title: Good Developer
excerpt: The essential qualities of a programmer (and when it might be better to choose another path).
content: Being a good developer goes beyond just writing code. It involves understanding the problem, thinking critically, and continuously learning. In this article, we explore the essential qualities that make a programmer successful...
author: Reza Taghizadeh

title: Publish a Package
excerpt: How we can publish a package in pub.dev, it is a guide step by step
content: Publishing a Flutter package to pub.dev is a great way to contribute to the Flutter ecosystem. This step-by-step guide will walk you through the entire process of creating and publishing your own package...
author: Reza Taghizadeh

title: Device Administration Permission
excerpt: How we can get this permission in android devices when we need it.
content: Device Administration permissions in Android allow apps to perform administrative tasks on the device. This article explains how to request and handle device administration permissions properly...
author: Reza Taghizadeh
